title: Citibank is the First Bank in the Czech Market to Offer CHPC Payments and O2 Service Payments by Direct Debit from Credit Cards
summary: Prague - Citibank Europe plc launched a new service in September 2012 that will allow Citi credit card holders to make the Centralized Household Payment Collection (CHPC) payments and payments for the services provided by Telefónica Czech Republic, a.s. by direct debit from Citi credit cards. Establishing the service and payments is entirely free of charge and, in addition, clients can use all benefits that Citi credit cards offer. Citibank is the first bank in the Czech market to offer this service to clients.
tag-1: Citibank is the First Bank in the Czech Market to Offer CHPC Payments and O2 Service Payments by Direct Debit from Credit Cards
tag-2: Prague – Citibank Europe plc launched a new service in September 2012 that will allow Citi credit card holders to make the Centralized Household Payment Collection (CHPC) payments and payments for the services provided by Telefónica Czech Republic, a.s. by direct debit from Citi credit cards. Establishing the service and payments is entirely free of charge and, in addition, clients can use all benefits that Citi credit cards offer. Citibank is the first bank in the Czech market to offer this service to clients.
tag-3: "All our clients who use O2 services and those who use the CHPC to make their regular monthly payments for rent, utilities and other services will find the new service very convenient," says Milan Reznícek, Credit Card Product Manager, Citibank. "Clients may apply for the service using the CitiPhone customer line, and will be asked to submit their CHPC number or their O2 telephone number. After that they don't need to worry about anything else, as Citibank will provide the settings with Ceská pošta and the telecom operator for them. Clients will most appreciate the equally attractive bonuses and benefits for the CHPC and O2 payments as they do for any other payments made using Citi credit cards. For example, with the Citi Life credit card, the bonus is 2 percent of the transaction amount."
tag-4: The service will save Citibank clients time since they will no longer have to make one-time payments or go to the post office every month, and they can also use a number of other benefits that Citi credit cards offer. In addition to an interest-free period of up to 55 days, the holders of the Citi Life credit card will receive a bonus of 2 percent from each payment made using the credit card and a 0.5 percent bonus from payments using the Shell MasterCard credit card issued by Citibank. Clients who are frequent travellers will appreciate the option to earn miles as part of the OK Plus program when paying with the Citi CSA MasterCard World credit card.
tag-5: All Citi credit card holders can use their Citi credit cards for payments while enjoying the benefits and discounts provided by partners as part of the Citi Club program that offers access to attractive offers in restaurants, shopping, travel, sports, healthcare and body care all over the Czech Republic.
tag-6: See our new website at www.citibank.cz.
